title: Welcome To Heap Art
body: This is the hub of my creations.
Here you'll find updates from my YouTube Channel and my Software projects.
If You would like to stay up to date on everything happening here on Heap Art: Remember to Subscribe to my Email List here.
Thanks!
Wilson Lee @HeapArt

title: See What's New!
body: Catch the latest news on Heap Art by reading our News Feed!
Subscribe to my News Feed by Joining my Email List here!

title: Browse My Origami Database
body: Here on our site, you could browse our database of Origami tutorials several ways!
<ul>
• Origami Tutorials from A-Z to have our tutorials sorted alphabetically.
• Origami Tutorials by Designer to have the tutorials sorted by Designer Name.
• 100 Exotic Airplanes Project to see only my Exotic Paper Airplane Series sorted chronologically.
• My own designes to see a list of my origami designes.
All links Avaulable under the Origami Tab
Wilson Lee @Heap Art

title: Checkout My Latest Origami Tutorials
body: These origami tutorials are from my YouTube Channel Heap Art. Check it out when you have a chance
To Subscribe click here
Thanks!
Wilson Lee @HeapArt

title: Random Origami of the Day
body: Pratice origami by folding whatever is in the video below. It changes Everyday!

title: Random Paper Airplane of the Day
body: This is today's Exotic Paper Airplane. It is randomly selected from our library. It's something different everyday. Have you seen this one before?
You could watch the up to date collection here on out official "100 Exotic Paper Airplanes Challenge" page.
